output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF 11240017" 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu, candidatul Partidului Social Democrat (PSD) la Președinția României" 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement with significant reach (90,000-99,999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, presents Ciolacu's vision and proposals as a presidential candidate 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly promotional content rather than journalistic 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication with electoral purpose
The post contains several elements that classify it as electoral propaganda: - Official party communication (PSD Brasov) - Direct reference to presidential candidate Marcel Ciolacu - Presents campaign promises and vision - Uses campaign marketing ID (CMF) - Significant paid reach - Promotes candidate's presidential platform
This is being promoted after the conclusion of the presidential campaign period, which ended at 7:00 AM on November 23, 2024.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Presents electoral promises - Is a paid advertisement - Reaches a wide audience - Promotes specific policy positions of the candidate
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Brașov, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea acesteia, promovând în mod activ candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID: 567368295837608) care prezintă viziunea și promisiunile electorale ale candidatului pentru funcția de președinte. Materialul, care include numărul de marketing electoral CMF 11240017, promovează în mod direct platforma prezidențială a candidatului după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, constituind astfel o încălcare clară a prevederilor legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
